file.name: positive2.yaml
file.content:
openapi: 3.0.0
info:
  title: Simple API overview
  version: 1.0.0
components:
  parameters:
    idParam:
      name: id
      in: path
      description: ID of the API version
      required: true
      schema:
        type: int
    nameParam:
      in: path
      description: Name of the API version
      required: true
      schema:
        type: string
paths:
  "/":
    get:
      operationId: listVersionsv2
      summary: List API versions
      responses:
        "200":
          description: 200 response
          content:
            application/json:
              examples:
                foo:
                  value:
                    versions:
                      - status: CURRENT
                        updated: "2011-01-21T11:33:21Z"
                        id: v2.0
                        links:
                          - href: http://127.0.0.1:8774/v2/
                            rel: self
    parameters:
      - $ref: "#path/parameters/idParam"
      - $ref: "#components/schemas/idParam"
  /user/id:
    get:
      parameters:
        - $ref: "#path/parameters/idParam"

Error: parse: parse spec: parse components: parameters: "idParam": schema: parse schema: unexpected schema type: "int"
